ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:39:40 urn:comixology:806073 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:55:27. [Issue ID 2046919]
ComicInfo.Summary:
THE DEADLY TRUTH REVEALED!
At last - the final showdown between Valeria and her quarry!
But as VALERIA confronts the shocking revelations of her brother's death, what will this mean for her, and for the Knights of Mitra?
All your questions will be answered!
Plus: The final chapter of the all-new novella "THE FALL OF THOTH-AMON"!
Note: Includes the fifth part in a five part The Fall of Thoth-Amon novella by Matt Forbeck.
ComicInfo.Title: Valeria, Chapter Five: Heart of Vengeance
ComicInfo.Letterer: Travis Lanham,VC's Travis Lanham,VC's Travis Lanham
